medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive pain and complications related to orthopedic implants, suspected to be caused by Brucella melitensis infection.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Varied among cases: Case 1 reported two years of progressive left hip pain; Case 2 had a two-month history of hip pain and limping; Case 3 presented with swelling over the site of a previous tibial osteotomy, which progressed post-surgery.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past surgeries include total hip arthroplasty in Case 1 and Case 2. Case 3 had a previous left tibial osteotomy with a metal plate in 1984. All cases involved prior contact with cattle.
medical_history.social_history: Patients had occupations involving close contact with cattle; Case 3 consumed goat cheese months prior to symptoms.
